video_guid wrote:

> I'm trying to only save documents that have a certain pattern in the
> body of the document.  I can't figure out a way to do this.  It's
> possible to filter on content type, but I want an arcWriter filter
> that looks at the body, say by runing a regex match over the text.
>
There is no such filter in Heritrix currently.  You'll have to write 
one.  Do it as a standalone filter or as a DecideRule to include in a 
DecidingFilter.  See developer manual for notes on how to write your own 
filter.  Study the ARCWriterProcessor for how to get an inputstream on 
to the downloaded content or see ExtractorHTML for an example of running 
regexes across the downloaded content.

Yours,
St.Ack
